name: Moogaloo-Boogaloo
description:
This is my 3D Platformer game, collect the keys and make your way through the levels to complete the game.

I have added the following modifications -

  • Create a complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in your game.
  • Modify the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.

(Note - I wasn't sure how to fix it but when you complete a level the next level button won't work, I've tried to type in the correct level name it should go to and I have even reset the settings but it always defaults back to say either "MainMenu" or the level that it is e.g Level2 would change onto Level2."

Credits -
TraumaDog Productions
